summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ColdIQ MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), frontend public pages working well, but authentication integration issue prevents testing of protected features.

integration_issues.issue: Users created via backend API cannot login through frontend - returns 401 error

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper styling and CTA buttons
Navigation between public pages (landing, pricing, login, signup)
User signup flow - form validation and submission
Onboarding flow - 3 steps (role, industry, volume) working
Pricing page displays all 4 tier cards correctly
All 14 backend API endpoints (auth, analysis, insights, billing)
Email analysis API with Claude AI integration
JWT token creation and validation on backend
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication integration - investigate why users created via API cannot login through frontend (401 error). This prevents testing of protected pages (analyzer, history, insights, settings). Likely issue with JWT token handling or user session management between backend and frontend.

success_percentage.overall: 75% (core functionality working, auth integration needs fix)
